articles.description: We recently spotted a big-time price drop on Apple’s latest 14-inch M4 Pro MacBook Pro with some upgraded specs over at Amazon, but B&H has that deal beat out today. You will now find this M4 Pro model with the standard 24GB and an upgraded 1TB SSD down at $2…
